segments.source_content:
---
slug: /migration/v2/versioned-sites
---
# Versioned sites
Read up https://docusaurus.io/blog/2018/09/11/Towards-Docusaurus-2#versioning first for problems in v1's approach.

translations.zh-CN: 请先阅读 https://docusaurus.io/blog/2018/09/11/Towards-Docusaurus-2#versioning 了解v1版本控制方案存在的问题。

segments.source_content:
:::note

The versioned docs should normally be migrated correctly by the [migration CLI](./migration-automated.mdx)

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

版本化文档通常可通过[迁移CLI](./migration-automated.mdx)正确迁移

:::

segments.source_content: ## Migrate your `versioned_docs` front matter {#migrate-your-versioned_docs-front-matter}

Unlike v1, The Markdown header for each versioned doc is no longer altered by using `version-${version}-${original_id}` as the value for the actual ID field. See scenario below for better explanation.

translations.zh-CN: 与v1不同，每个版本化文档的Markdown头部不再通过使用`version-${version}-${original_id}`作为实际ID字段的值来修改。具体场景见下文说明。

segments.source_content: For example, if you have a `docs/hello.md`.

```md
---
id: hello
title: Hello, World !
---

Hi, Endilie here :)
```
When you cut a new version 1.0.0, in Docusaurus v1, `website/versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/hello.md` looks like this:

translations.zh-CN: 当您创建新版本1.0.0时，在Docusaurus v1中，`website/versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/hello.md`内容如下：

segments.source_content:
```md
---
id: version-1.0.0-hello
title: Hello, World !
original_id: hello
---

Hi, Endilie here :)
```
In comparison, Docusaurus 2 `website/versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/hello.md` looks like this (exactly same as original)

translations.zh-CN: 相比之下，Docusaurus 2的`website/versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/hello.md`内容如下（与原文件完全一致）

segments.source_content:
```md
---
id: hello
title: Hello, World !
---

Hi, Endilie here :)
```

Since we're going for snapshot and allow people to move (and edit) docs easily inside version. The `id` front matter is no longer altered and will remain the same. Internally, it is set as `version-${version}/${id}`.

translations.zh-CN: 由于我们采用快照机制并允许用户在版本间自由移动（和编辑）文档，`id` front matter不再被修改且保持原样。内部实际使用`version-${version}/${id}`作为标识。

segments.source_content: Essentially, here are the necessary changes in each versioned_docs file:

translations.zh-CN: 每个versioned_docs文件需要做以下必要修改：

segments.source_content:
```diff {2-3,5}
---
- id: version-1.0.0-hello
+ id: hello
title: Hello, World !
- original_id: hello
---
Hi, Endilie here :)
```
## Migrate your `versioned_sidebars` {#migrate-your-versioned_sidebars}
- Refer to `versioned_docs` ID as `version-${version}/${id}` (v2) instead of `version-${version}-${original_id}` (v1).
Because in v1 there is a good chance someone created a new file with front matter ID `"version-${version}-${id}"` that can conflict with `versioned_docs` ID.

translations.zh-CN: 因为在v1中很可能有人创建了front matter ID为`"version-${version}-${id}"`的新文件，这会与`versioned_docs`的ID产生冲突。

segments.source_content: For example, Docusaurus 1 can't differentiate `docs/xxx.md`

```md
---
id: version-1.0.0-hello
---

Another content
```
vs `website/versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/hello.md`

```md
---
id: version-1.0.0-hello
title: Hello, World !
original_id: hello
---

Hi, Endilie here :)
```
Since we don't allow `/` in v1 & v2 for front matter, conflicts are less likely to occur.

translations.zh-CN: 由于v1和v2都不允许在front matter中使用`/`，冲突可能性降低。

segments.source_content: So v1 users need to migrate their versioned_sidebars file

translations.zh-CN: 因此v1用户需要迁移他们的versioned_sidebars文件

segments.source_content: Example `versioned_sidebars/version-1.0.0-sidebars.json`:
## Populate your `versioned_sidebars` and `versioned_docs` {#populate-your-versioned_sidebars-and-versioned_docs}

In v2, we use snapshot approach for documentation versioning. **Every versioned docs does not depends on other version**. It is possible to have `foo.md` in `version-1.0.0` but it doesn't exist in `version-1.2.0`. This is not possible in previous version due to Docusaurus v1 fallback functionality (https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/versioning#fallback-functionality).

translations.zh-CN: 在v2中，我们采用快照机制进行文档版本控制。**每个版本的文档不依赖其他版本**。可能出现`version-1.0.0`中有`foo.md`而`version-1.2.0`中没有的情况。这在旧版本中不可能实现，因为Docusaurus v1有回退功能(https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/versioning#fallback-functionality)。

segments.source_content: For example, if your `versions.json` looks like this in v1

translations.zh-CN: 例如，如果v1中您的`versions.json`如下所示

segments.source_content:
```json title="versions.json"
["1.1.0", "1.0.0"]
```
Docusaurus v1 creates versioned docs **if and only if the doc content is different**. Your docs structure might look like this if the only doc changed from v1.0.0 to v1.1.0 is `hello.md`.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v1仅在文档内容不同时才会创建版本化文档。如果从v1.0.0到v1.1.0只有`hello.md`被修改，您的文档结构可能如下所示。

segments.source_content:
```bash
website
├── versioned_docs
│   ├── version-1.1.0
│   │   └── hello.md
│   └── version-1.0.0
│       ├── foo
│       │   └── bar.md
│       └── hello.md
├── versioned_sidebars
│   └── version-1.0.0-sidebars.json
```
In v2, you have to populate the missing `versioned_docs` and `versioned_sidebars` (with the right front matter and ID reference too).

translations.zh-CN: 在v2中，您需要手动填充缺失的`versioned_docs`和`versioned_sidebars`（同时确保front matter和ID引用正确）。

segments.source_content:
```bash {3-5,12}
website
├── versioned_docs
│   ├── version-1.1.0
│   │   ├── foo
│   │   │   └── bar.md
│   │   └── hello.md
│   └── version-1.0.0
│       ├── foo
│       │   └── bar.md
│       └── hello.md
├── versioned_sidebars
│   ├── version-1.1.0-sidebars.json
│   └── version-1.0.0-sidebars.json
```
## Convert style attributes to style objects in MDX {#convert-style-attributes-to-style-objects-in-mdx}

translations.zh-CN: ## 将 MDX 中的样式属性转换为样式对象 {#convert-style-attributes-to-style-objects-in-mdx}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus 2 uses JSX for doc files. If you have any style attributes in your Docusaurus 1 docs, convert them to style objects, like this:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 2 使用 JSX 处理文档文件。如果您在 Docusaurus 1 的文档中使用了任何样式属性，请将它们转换为样式对象，如下所示：

segments.source_content: ```diff --- id: demo title: Demo --- ## Section hello world - pre style="background: black">zzz + pre style={{background: 'black'}}>zzz ```
